Goal.Title: Put you small goal title here

Event.GoalComment: General comment go here (double tap to start edit, enter - to finish, esc or cross on the edge - cancel edit)

Conclusion.Description: <- There is tag inside, edit to see
You always can see help on the right top corner (click "?" sign)

Event.GoalComment: Select row and push "del" to delete row (you can try it with that row and with others too)
Save button to save your changes (just exit from app doesnt work)
Event.GeneralComment: Add button will add new row, Tags button will show aggrageted tags

Conclusion.Description: So now you are ready to use this app!
Feel free to delete all of these rows!
